title: Fix Sakthi Snacks mismatched dish images and mapping to corrected static assets

requirements.summary: Replace visually mismatched Sakthi Snacks generated dish images with corrected v2 static assets using deterministic filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: For each affected Sakthi Snacks image asset, a corrected replacement image is added to `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the new filenames specified in Image Requirements (edits).
The corrected images visually match their dish names (e.g., pani puri shows puris with chutneys; murukku shows chakli/murukku spirals).
No runtime network fetch is introduced for these images; they remain static assets served by the frontend.

file_operations.description: Add the corrected generated image per Image Requirements edit: dish-sakthi-pani-puri.dim_512x512.png > dish-sakthi-pani-puri.v2.dim_512x512.png (crispy pani puri with chutneys and sev).

Add the corrected generated image per Image Requirements edit: dish-sakthi-bhel-puri.dim_512x512.png > dish-sakthi-bhel-puri.v2.dim_512x512.png (bhel puri bowl with puffed rice, sev, onions, tomatoes, coriander, tamarind drizzle).
Add the corrected generated image per Image Requirements edit: dish-sakthi-onion-pakoda.dim_512x512.png > dish-sakthi-onion-pakoda.v2.dim_512x512.png (golden onion pakoda/fritters with mint chutney).
Add the corrected generated image per Image Requirements edit: dish-sakthi-bajji.dim_512x512.png > dish-sakthi-bajji.v2.dim_512x512.png (mixed vegetable bajji with chutneys).
Add the corrected generated image per Image Requirements edit: dish-sakthi-sundal.dim_512x512.png > dish-sakthi-sundal.v2.dim_512x512.png (spiced sundal with coconut and curry leaves).
Add the corrected generated image per Image Requirements edit: dish-sakthi-murukku.dim_512x512.png > dish-sakthi-murukku.v2.dim_512x512.png (South Indian murukku/chakli spirals stacked on a plate).

requirements.summary: Update Sakthi Snacks dish-name fallback mappings so menu items resolve to the corrected v2 assets and fix known wrong mappings.
acceptanceCriteria: When rendering the Sakthi Snacks restaurant menu, each menu itemâ€™s image resolves to the correct Sakthi Snacks asset via `getDishImageUrl(item.imageUrl, item.name)`.
Known incorrect Sakthi Snacks mappings are fixed so that unrelated items are not mapped to the Sakthi Snacks-specific assets (e.g., items like "jalebi" do not resolve to a "sundal" image asset).
If a menu item has an empty/legacy/incorrect `imageUrl`, the correct image is still selected via name-based mapping where available.

file_operations.description: Update `DISH_NAME_TO_IMAGE` entries for Sakthi Snacks items to point to the new v2 assets (e.g., mappings that currently use dish-sakthi-pani-puri.dim_512x512.png / dish-sakthi-bhel-puri.dim_512x512.png / dish-sakthi-onion-pakoda.dim_512x512.png / dish-sakthi-bajji.dim_512x512.png / dish-sakthi-sundal.dim_512x512.png / dish-sakthi-murukku.dim_512x512.png should resolve to their corresponding v2 filenames under frontend/public/assets/generated/). Fix incorrect Sakthi mapping(s) such as 'jalebi' no longer mapping to the sundal asset; map it to a non-Sakthi appropriate fallback (e.g., generic) unless a correct jalebi asset exists.

Extend `isLegacyAssetUrl()` to treat the old (non-v2) Sakthi Snacks generated filenames for the affected dishes as legacy/invalid, so that if the backend still supplies those older URLs, `getDishImageUrl()` will re-resolve via name-based mapping to the corrected v2 static assets (no runtime fetch; still served as frontend static assets).
